name: Ant VR
description:
Short game made for Google Cardboard. Created for GBC Jam #1: Heat
Cardboard Controls: Ring Trigger fires a laser.
Non-Cardboard Controls: Touching the screen fires a laser

Programmer:

  • Lee Tran

Models/Textures:

  • Kimberly Koronya
  • Michael Schwarz
  • Peeter Maimik

Sound/Music:

  • Mike Romaniak
  • Liam Gallagher
